Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Enums
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Classes
    Class Description
    ninja.leaping.configurate.util.ConfigurationNodeWalker
    Use ScopedConfigurationNode#visit(ConfigurationVisitor) instead
  • Enums
    Enum Description
    ninja.leaping.configurate.ValueType
    Use ConfigurationNode.isList() and ConfigurationNode.isMap() for the same information
  • Methods
    Method Description
    ninja.leaping.configurate.attributed.AttributedConfigurationNode.getAppendedNode()
    ninja.leaping.configurate.attributed.SimpleAttributedConfigurationNode.getAppendedNode()
    ninja.leaping.configurate.attributed.SimpleAttributedConfigurationNode.root()
    Use AttributedConfigurationNode.root() instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.attributed.SimpleAttributedConfigurationNode.root​(String)
    Use AttributedConfigurationNode.root(String) instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.attributed.SimpleAttributedConfigurationNode.root​(String, ConfigurationOptions)
    Use AttributedConfigurationNode.root(String, ConfigurationOptions) instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.commented.CommentedConfigurationNode.getAppendedNode()
    ninja.leaping.configurate.commented.SimpleCommentedConfigurationNode.getAppendedNode()
    ninja.leaping.configurate.commented.SimpleCommentedConfigurationNode.root()
    Use CommentedConfigurationNode.root() instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.commented.SimpleCommentedConfigurationNode.root​(ConfigurationOptions)
    Use CommentedConfigurationNode.root(ConfigurationOptions) instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationNode.getAppendedNode()
    Use ConfigurationNode.appendListNode() instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationNode.getValueType()
    Use ConfigurationNode.isList() and ConfigurationNode.isMap() for the same information
    ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationNode.hasListChildren()
    Use ConfigurationNode.isList() instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationNode.hasMapChildren()
    Use ConfigurationNode.isMap() instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationOptions.setAcceptedTypes​(Set<Class<?>>)
    Use ConfigurationOptions.withNativeTypes(Set) instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationOptions.setMapFactory​(MapFactory)
    USe ConfigurationOptions.withMapFactory(MapFactory) instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationOptions.setObjectMapperFactory​(ObjectMapperFactory)
    Use ConfigurationOptions.withObjectMapperFactory(ObjectMapperFactory) instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationOptions.setSerializers​(TypeSerializerCollection)
    Use ConfigurationOptions.withSerializers(TypeSerializerCollection) instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationOptions.setShouldCopyDefaults​(boolean)
    Use ConfigurationOptions.withShouldCopyDefaults(boolean)
    ninja.leaping.configurate.loader.AbstractConfigurationLoader.Builder.preservesHeader()
    In favour of AbstractConfigurationLoader.Builder.getHeaderMode()
    ninja.leaping.configurate.loader.AbstractConfigurationLoader.Builder.setPreservesHeader​(boolean)
    In favour of AbstractConfigurationLoader.Builder.setHeaderMode(HeaderMode)
    ninja.leaping.configurate.objectmapping.ObjectMapper.collectFields​(Map<String, ObjectMapper.FieldData>, Class<? super T>)
    Use ObjectMapper.collectFields(Map, TypeToken) instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.objectmapping.ObjectMapper.getMappedType()
    Use ObjectMapper.getType() to be aware of parameterized types
    ninja.leaping.configurate.objectmapping.ObjectMapper.isLegacy()
    Backwards compatibility measure, to be removed in 4.0
    ninja.leaping.configurate.objectmapping.serialize.TypeSerializerCollection.registerPredicate​(Predicate<TypeToken<T>>, TypeSerializer<? super T>)
    Use TypeSerializerCollection.register(Predicate, TypeSerializer) instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.objectmapping.serialize.TypeSerializerCollection.registerType​(TypeToken<T>, TypeSerializer<? super T>)
    Use #register(TypeToken, TypeSerializer) instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.objectmapping.serialize.TypeSerializers.getDefaultSerializers()
    see TypeSerializerCollection.defaults()
    ninja.leaping.configurate.objectmapping.serialize.TypeSerializers.newCollection()
    see TypeSerializerCollection.create()
    ninja.leaping.configurate.SimpleConfigurationNode.getAppendedNode()
    ninja.leaping.configurate.SimpleConfigurationNode.root()
    Use ConfigurationNode.root() instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.SimpleConfigurationNode.root​(ConfigurationOptions)
    Use ConfigurationNode.root(ConfigurationOptions) instead
    ninja.leaping.configurate.xml.XMLConfigurationLoader.loadInternal​(AttributedConfigurationNode, BufferedReader)
  • Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ninja.leaping.configurate.objectmapping.ObjectMapper​(Class<T>)
    Use ObjectMapper(TypeToken) instead to support parameterized types
